CDAT
====

# Available modules


The overview below shows which CDAT installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using CDAT, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load CDAT/8.2.1-foss-2020a-Python-3.8.2
```
